MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH29 and EH30 postcode areas of South Queensferry, Kirkliston, Cragiehall and the surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:30pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair a grounded overhead power line affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:50pm on Monday, 8th February 2021
